item.title: Is this why nothing gets done at Valve?
item.dc:creator: targ
item.description:
Orpheon:

WILL WE EVER SEE HALF LIFE 3???

I think the fact that we have seen several projects other than Half-Life 3 is actually proof that this person is full of shit:

She said her team was starved for resources because the company’s bonus system kept Valve employees glued to very prestigious projects, bonuses that are larger than what they actually earn. Those people only wanted to work on a sure thing, not something risky like augmented reality.

If this were true, all their resources would be devoted to Half-Life and they would have been churning out spinoffs regularly. On the contrary, almost everything Valve has done in the meantime has been experimental and risky. Hell, they even hired an experimental psychologist.
